description:
Kleenex Allergy Comfort tissues are extra soft & smooth with reduced linting for allergy sufferers.

Kleenex Allergy Comfort Facial Tissues have reduced linting for allergy sufferers.

Extra soft and smooth.

Dermatologically tested and Hypoallergenic.

Lotion, Dye & Fragrance free.

3-ply thickness, 85 sheets per box, 20.5cm x 19.5cm.

Our Kleenex Facial Tissues are Aussie made and we’re proud of it; they’ve been made at our Millicent mill in South Australia since 1966. This means support for local communities, including hundreds of local employees and their families, each year.

FSC Certified, ensuring responsible forest management, meeting the most rigorous environmental and social standard for responsible forest management.

Reduced Linting Reduced linting for allergy sufferers

Extra soft and smooth

Dermatologically tested and Hypoallergenic Dermatologically tested and Hypoallergenic

Lotion, Dye & Fragrance free

Made in Australia Kleenex Facial Tissues have been made at our Millicent Mill in South Australia since 1966.

FSC Certified Made from ethically sourced fibre that promotes the sustainable management of forests, Kleenex Facial Tissue has earned Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certification - the highest possible independent standard for responsible forest management.

3-Ply Thickness 3-Ply Thickness
name: Kleenex Allergy Comfort 3 Ply Facial Tissues 85 Pack
